content: back of your work as if to knit - slip one stitch purlwise from the left needle to right needle - move your yarn to the front of your work as if to purl - slip the stitch that you moved to your right needle back onto your left needle - flip your work around to begin a rs row - continue as directed by pattern knitting wraps with their stitches rs row - work to wrapped stitch as directed by pattern - slip wrapped stitch purlwise from the left needle to the right needle - slide the tip of the left needle up into the wrap s * then slip the stitch from your right needle back to your left needle - knit both the wrap s and the stitch together as if they were one stitch ws row - work to wrapped stitch as directed by pattern - slip wrapped stitch purlwise from the left needle to the right needle - slide the tip of the left needle up into the wrap s then slip the stitch from your right needle back to your left needle - purl both the wrap s and the stitch together through the back loop as if they were one stitch *in this pattern all but the first wrapped stitches will have two wraps-- make sure to grab both of them when knitting/purling the wraps together with their stitches pattern and photos copyright 2016 ashley dorian medwig please do not sell items made using this pattern
